items.title: Home Depot founder Arthur Blank donates $50 million to Atlanta’s historically Black colleges and universities via foundation

items.title: ‘It is very important to vindicate her’: Mexico’s president want to reclaim the story of Malinche, 16th century translator for the conquistadors
items.description: Mexico kicks off cultural events dedicated to Malinche with her pre-Hispanic name, Malintzin, on the anniversary of Christopher Columbus' arrival.

items.title: CEO of $8 billion AI company says he’s ‘mind boggled’ that people think you can work 38 hours a week, have work-life balance, and be successful

items.title: China calls for Trump to drop 100% tariff threat, urges U.S. to ‘promptly correct its erroneous practices’
items.description: Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesman Lin Jian said "China will certainly take resolute measures to safeguard its legitimate rights and interests.”
